tasks.label: push-portfolio-to-github
tasks.command:
git rev-parse --is-inside-work-tree || (git init && git checkout -b master)
 git remote get-url origin || git remote add origin https://github.com/not0aag/PersonalPortfolio.git
 git add -A
 git commit -m "Align portfolio to 2026 resume: Home intro, About card, Tech stack, projects data + CTA, and Resume button fix" || echo No changes to commit
 git push -u origin master
